level.heading: Applicability to foreign corporations.
level.text: In any derivative proceeding in the right of a foreign nonprofit corporation, the matters covered by this subchapter shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction of incorporation of the foreign corporation, except for §§ 29-411.04, 29-411.06, and 29-411.07.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
